Avril Chamomile floral water

Brand: Avril

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: anthemis nobilis flower water*, leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate, aqua (water).

Directions: Apply directly to the face or on a cotton pad. Use in the evening only.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and
y, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
